CmdLine: apk add --update ca-certificates wget &&     wget -O /nomad_${NOMAD_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip https://releases.hashicorp.com/nomad/${NOMAD_VERSION}/nomad_${NOMAD_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip &&     echo "${NOMAD_SHA256}  nomad_${NOMAD_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip" > /nomad.sha256 &&     sha256sum -c /nomad.sha256 &&     cd /usr/local/bin &&     unzip /nomad_${NOMAD_VERSION}_linux_amd64.zip &&     apk del ca-certificates wget &&     rm -rfv /nomad* /var/cache/apk/*
Commands.Name: run
